devdoc.details: This is an intermediary contract to fix the griefing attack vulnerability in the MYNT contract that is not upgradeable, e.g: DLLR, when using transfer withPermit function.

TransferWithPermit(address,address,uint2.details: Emitted when transfer  Manager config is changed.

balanceOf(address).details: Proxy function to get the actual myntToken balance

getChainId().details: to support EIP712, will need the token contract to return the chain id.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferWithPermit(address,address,uint2.details: This is the intermediary function of transferWithPermit (permit + transferFro) to the actual mynt token contract address.

params._amount: The amount of the token that will be transferred.

transferWithPermit(address,address,uint2.notice: destination cannot be: - zero (0x0) address. - actual mynt token contract address.
